🚨 $POLY AIRDROP RUMOUR🚨 Polynomial has launched a Trading Season with NFT levels for reaching specific volume milestones. Traders on Polynomial are eligible for 300,000 $OP rewards every week. On top, you can get up to 30% boosted $OP by trading more and levelling up👇
